data.message: Might b a subliminal that he is gonna diss drake cuz he promoting Joe and saying welcome to Detroit pic seems photoshopped bit like he ready to cook and drake sitting back like I'm smiling for the camera but dying inside cuz em bout to get crazy I guess one can only hope the rap god puts him on his place for the sake of real rap lol

replies.message: Nah there is a video on Twitter of drake and em sharing the stage and drake bowed to em, saying he is the best rapper to ever touch a microphone. I don't think there will be any dis tracks between the two.

Lmfao people want beef so hard.
They shared the stage - Em doesn't share the stage with anyone, unless he respects them, or is legitimately about to body them right there.
Views from The Joe is Joe Louis Arena in Detroit....wow lol
Nah I know I was just saying one could hope but I didn't know about Drake bowing out to him on stage but that was all just wishful thinking lol
Views from The Joe means the arena they were in.

You're just seeing things that aren't their and overthinking it to justify what you hope/think is going on, the entire beef thing was a joke from the start. None of it was true, if they did battle it would be only out of fun. Eminem respects Drake and even said himself that hip hop needs him. I may not like Drake and alot of people don't but if their was beef Eminem would never had said those things and even done a photo with him. Honestly I think Eminem's beef days are long gone. He has nothing more to prove and is still in his prime. He may not be in the top 20 hits anymore but he's actually better now than he ever was. Just because he's not dropping club hits doesn't make him garbage which is what people are thinking now a days, He's just legit rapping now. That's what everyone wanted from him. And he's doing just that. Staying involved in the rap scene and keeping it alive.

Nah I hear that and ur right he not garbage I think he's hands down miles in front of everyone and I agree he better now then he has ever been and he don't have to prove anything I just said it so people of the drake generation could see how a real master of the craft goes head to head but I was clearly reaching and showing its wish full thinking I never thought they would go head to head thought it b cool though and I know its Joe louis arena I just said what some people thinking but I honestly never thought they would em is the king
Em always have some words with 2 meanings
